title: Tomb of the Triclinium-use of color to show gender

content.question: In creating the figures, the artist used which of the following conventions of representation typical of the culture?

choices.label: Contrapposto to show the figures in motion
Registers to divide multiple scenes of the narrative
Hierarchical scale to distinguish the ruler from the subjects
